planets.name: Project Overview
planets.subtitle: S.T.U.P.I.D. (Space Time Universal Planetary Individual Destroyers)
info: Each PFP DeefZoid Avatar is unique and serve as your identity within WEB3. The Traits will be forged in the future for Exclusive Merchandise.
Each DeefZoid has their own corresponding Sprite Avatar within the S.T.U.P.I.D. P2E Game with their own skill set based on the NFT's traits.

planets.name: S.T.U.P.I.D. Vision
planets.subtitle: The vision and mission of the founders in shaping the STUPID Metaverse
info: The vision of the S.T.U.P.I.D. Project is to be able to create a community wherein multiple projects can benefit from, ranging from exchanging Alphas, engaging with real life activities and playing in the S.T.U.P.I.D. Game.

The Spacetime Universal Planetary Individual Destroyers is an over the top project that aims to unite the PFP and P2E concept all in one fluid experience.

With an out of this world collection of 6,000 Deefzoids that grant you perpetual access to the world of S.T.U.P.I.Ds allowing you to immerse yourself in all the glory the game has to offer, enter dungeons for quests, battle it out with your friends, form meaningful alliances through the guild system.

planets.name: Lore
planets.subtitle: The story on how the S.T.U.P.I.D. Organization started
info: It all started when....

After a long night of partying at an Intergalactic bar found in Central Solavia, a band of 10 or so DeefZoids we're ready to call it a night a little earlier than usual.

A few of the DeefZoids had to go to work in the morning at an augmented microtech firm and month 217 was always a busy time of century.

Being such a large group of friends always got them into trouble. It was difficult enough for them to get seated at bars or charging stations together and they were often kicked out of venues for being too loud and obnoxious.

The gang hopped in their new 14wFAS Spacecraft that they had won a few weeks prior at the Degen Casino in the Waytime Galaxy. Xarno the self-proclaimed leader of the group, inputted their course home in the main console. Due to new laws being passed in Solavia, manual flight was mandatory at night.

'There's no way I can take us home right now' he said to the rest of the squad.

'It's fine' another replied. 'Just put us on course for home and if we get a ticket, we'll all split it.'

The group settled into the luxurious den of the Spacecraft. Soon enough, they were all asleep. It was a long ride home to Planet Tarkann but nothing that they weren't used to. They all shared a love for planetary exploration and often made trips to far out bars and venues.

Just as they were about to cross the Solavian border, the spacecraft met a terrifyingly large meteorite......
Next part of the Lore will come soon....

planets.name: Gameplay
planets.subtitle: The P2E Game of the 6,000 S.T.U.P.I.D. Alien Avatars named Deefzoids
info:
PVE Mode

Each DeefZoid holds a specific weapon type, each weapon type have their own unique skill set to fight the enemies and gather $STPD Scraps to upgrade their equipment and ship.

Adventure Mode

A DeefZoid will be your own unique identity in the S.T.U.P.I.D. World. Meet, Team up, Hangout and Fight Monsters alongside your fellow DeefZoids.

Player v Player (PvP) Mode

Fight your way to the top against your fellow DeefZoids to prove who is the best.

More info on the Whitepaper Link:

TBA

planets.name: Roadmap
planets.subtitle: The path into the future
info:
The statement of the mission we want to achieve

Click on a Part of the Spaceship and See whats in store. There are 4 parts.

The traits in the metadata are not mere traits for your danky NFT, we aim to become your global top of mind brand in terms of NFT and IRL. Pop up stores and merch shit are only a few of the things we've got down the pipleline ~
The reason for the Clothing Trait of the Aliens looking like what it is, because we want to create a Clothing Brand based on the STUPID DeefZoids

planets.name: Team
planets.subtitle: The S.T.U.P.I.D. Degens behind the Project
info:
Amidamaru - Founder/Project Manager

A highly experienced, versatile, and accomplished social media influencer and content creator, he has reached millions of people across different social media platforms. He is a recognized frontline influencer, and has built and maintained a following on Web2

He is a smart and savvy marketing graduate who has handled and worked with numerous multinational brands. A Web3 native who has been involved in the crypto space for several years. combining the best of WEB3 technologies to build products that truly deliver value to the world..

Deus - Founder/Developer

A software engineer/full stack developer whose experience spans a multitude of areas. Being on the forefront of blockchain development, he has since earned a reputation as one of the most knowledgeable people in NFT and blockchain technology.

He has developed and deployed Smart Contracts for both ETH and SOL chains for various projects to expand his learnings. For him, it's all about people, technology and value creation.

He is also well versed in game development based on his previous experiences, as well as his hobby before developing new features for private servers of games like World of Warcraft, Maplestory, and many more.

Vans - Community Manager

With over a decade of experience in the gaming industry, he is a seasoned expert in the world of content creation, marketing and analytics. He uses his deep understanding of the game community to mentor and train popular streamers, content creators, and brands on the best ways to grow their audience and garner millions of views on their video. He is immensely analytical and focused on data driven improvements. He brings fresh ideas and new ways of thinking to the tab

Fishfeet - Artist

The Quack is a man of many facets, as diverse in his tastes as he is with his accomplishments. He is a versatile and enthusiastic freelance visual artist and a digital nomad. He has worked with several clients on international projects including card game designs, comics, album covers, banners, posters and etc.

A master procrastinator, he is creative and independent with a unique mind-set. He will never miss an opportunity for a good coffee, and always have the best memes at his disposal. He will make the STUPID world a better place by bringing his unique brand of weirdness into the mix.

Paul - Animator

Paul is a powerhouse of artistic talent. He brings characters to life through movement and art direction, while also working to achieve a seamless blend of sound, music, cinematography and editing.

He creates new worlds with his hands. He makes appealing animations covering a variety of styles and applications. With Paul in our STUPID team we are sure to bring all our awesome ideas to life!

PMLOW - Sprite Artist

ManuG - Animation Sequence/Voice Actor

CraftyZeno - Lore Creator/StoryTeller

PeeNut - 3D/2D Model Artist

Sunbreak - Game Theory/Blockchain Developer

KevZzZ - Blockchain Developer
